Class GeneralizedNormalizedShannonEntropy<R extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts.informationfunctions.GeneralizedNormalizedShannonEntropy<R,C>

    R - Type used to identify features.
    C - Type of the content "classes" of the TrainingPoints.

extends java.lang.Object
implements IERTScore<R,C>
    Computes the Normalized Shannon Entropy Information Gain for any number of classes.
